reuters.title: DATATMETRICS CORP <DMCZ> WINS ARMY CONTRACT
reuters.body: Datametrics Corp said it won a 4.9-mln-dlr contract from the U.S. Army. The company said Datametrics will deliver printer/plotters to the Army's Redstone Arsenal, beginning in September, 1987. Datametrics said it had a record backlog of funded and unfunded projects of 31.8 mln dlrs on March 1, 1987. Reuter 
